Player History

Hit first career homerun on 9/10/2028, off Byron Acuña (COL)...
Won World Series with Philadelphia in 2030...
Injured on 9/1/2031 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for 7 weeks...
Traded from Philadelphia to Chicago on 5/11/2032 (Going to CHI: SS Jason Kulp, 2B Cordell Tenorio, P Keith Lee, 1B Bernie Orta. Going to PHI: P George Martinez)...
Released by Chicago on 8/25/2032...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/2/2033 to a 2-year deal worth $3,000,000 per year...
